eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Cooke, TX; AT 03:56 PM ON SEP 23, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 04:26 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: ATTENTION! There is an extreme threat to life and property from hail!  One inch or greater diameter hail has been reported.  Seek shelter indoors, away from windows.  City of Gainesville Emergency Management.
